Bonnaroo was once again one of the most wonderful and amazing experiences of my life. All the people were so nice and so exepting of everyone that was there. It was because we were all there for the same main reason. The music. The music is what sets us free. Bonnaroo is it's own subculture that gets together each year to let go of all the bullshit of american society, and to get as fucked up as possible on as many psychadelics that one can find. I ate so much acid, some molly, sass, shrooms, and smoked pot till the sun came up, at least the first night i did literally til the sun came into sight. It was a beautiful bonnaroo sunrise that i only get to see once a year. I met so many awesome people. I shit you not, i even met Ben Harper's girlfriend. I just started talkin to this chick after the 1st show of the Machine and we laughed a little and talked some more, and then she told me she was the girlfriend of the man who sings I'm gonna burn one down. That was so cool! I was trippin pretty damn hard that night too! The Machine is a Very kick ass Pink Floyd cover band from New York. They rocked my brain so hardcore, and sent me on such a fat trip. So much more happened. I sold a good few necklaces. I gave away more of them though, but i like it better that way sometimes. I only sold them when i went broke, or traded them for food. On Sunday, i was sellin 'em on the road and some guy came up to me and Brett and started chattin, and he ended up gettin me spun for free! He was a good man, and i shall always remember him. 
  
Anyways, i really could go on and on and on for such a long time about Bonnaroo, but i'll save some of it for later. Monday when i got back, me and Jen went over to Cher's house and i got to meet her for the 1st time along with Audry and Amanda. They all seemed too cool. Cher is too awesome. She really gets into Boggle, but hey, so did i. It's a great game and it makes you think, but not too hard, so it's all good. I went swimming for like 3 minutes and jumped out. It was a wee bit nipply for me, and the 5 of us chilled and talked on the patio. 

Yesterday was awesome. Me, Jen, Jessica, Cher, and Cher's friend who's name starts with a G went to downtown ATL and got our hair done. I did meth for the 1st time that day. I enjoyed it a good bit. I can see how it can be crucialy addictive though, so i'se gots to stay away from it unless it's on a very distant occassion. It was fun. Thanks again fuck face. Jen's hair looks so pretty. It now ranges from a dark, redish pink to a light pink, to blond. It's awesome. I got plum colored tips on my newly forming dreadies. It was kind of half and half, some tips were plum, and some just a light blond. Today i died all the lighter ones pink though by myself. It looks really cool i think. It was really good to see Jes. She's doin good i guess. She thinks Aaron is cheating on her, but what else is new? She's in Oklahoma and he's in Georgia. There's the issue right there. Sorry sweety, I know that's gotta suck way bad.

No, nothing, and when i called him for the last time to say Bye, it was like he didn't give one damn about talkin to me or that i was even around, so ya know what. i wanted to go to Insomnia tonight to read a few of my poems, but i just got back from bala-ama, and i wanted to relax. Actually, i want to go out and party, but i know that aint gonna happen. Oh well. SO I NOW BRING MY POEM TO YOU. 

As I cry, my feelings for you liquify
  I'm trying to get by,
But if i said i was, it would be a lie
  I love you so much
And i hate that we can't be together
  In my life, I am suffocated by metaphorical bad weather
I want to feel your arms around me
  I don't want to be this free
If it means you have to leave my love life
  And leave my mind with such pain and strife
We went on a "break" to clear my mind,
  But now, I'm more confused and blind
I need your love, I need you here
  I can't have you disappear
Not right now, i need you too intensely
  If you think i'm wrong, please correct me.
I want to know how you feel
  How you cope and how you deal
With things such as this
  When you want me but you can't kiss
What goes through your mind when you think
  When you feel like you've lost your missing link?
That's all i ever wanted to know, and now it's too late
  but maybe it can still work, maybe it will be our fate

If he didn't want that,. he wouldn't of given us free though and minds to think, cuz if you don't do what makes you happy, then it's like someone is thinking for you, which would make you a sheep.
